title: Strategies for Utilizing DSML in Activity-Based Learning Design Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Core instructional design principles, science subject knowledge, basic LMS (Learning Management System) operation experience
context.additional_context: Competency-building in activity-based learning modeling specialized for science curriculum design, targeting pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Utilizing the visual notation system of DSML, one can design a science curriculum-based learning model with 80% accuracy.
Evaluate the semantic transparency of DSML icons based on learning activity types and propose three improvement strategies.
Complete the design of five or more science curriculum units using an LMS-integrated DSML authoring tool.
Assess the validity and practicality of DSML-based learning design models on a 4-point scale (1â€“4) through peer review.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
